messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Kim! I also have 3 boys. Lately, I have met alot of folks with a 3 boy family. I wonder what the stats are on that. Anyhoo- welcome! Kerry
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Kim! I also have 3 boys. Lately, I have met
alot of folks with a 3 boy family. I wonder what the
stats are on that. Anyhoo- welcome!
Kerry

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Missouri, new to group
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kim, Welcome to the group.I m Mary.  I unschool with my 5 children in NY.  We have a 10yog, 8yog, almost 6yob, 3 yog and a 9mob.  Unschooling is IMHO the
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kim,
Welcome to the group.I'm Mary. I unschool with my 5 children in NY. We
have a 10yog, 8yog, almost 6yob, 3 yog and a 9mob. Unschooling is IMHO the
greatest way to homeschool. We've done the other methods (ordered
curriculum, mom planned lessons) and have found unschooling to be the best
way.
Mary-NY


>From: Kim Hammond <azhom2000@...>
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Missouri, new to group
>Date: Wed, 7 Mar 2001 20:04:55 -0800 (PST)
>
>Hi my name is Kim and I am new to the group. I just
>removed my boys, 4th and 5th grade from public school
>in January. I had intended on Homeschooling, but
>quickly learned that my children and I are really
>unschooling. Things seem to be going pretty good. It
>takes some getting used to, a de-programming period,
>if you will! However, all in all we are doing pretty
>well, and learning together as we go. Our most
>difficult task is keeping the 20 month old boy
>satisfied.
>
>Also, Julie, what type of material do you have? I am
>in Missouri too. Where are you located? I am about
>35- 40 miles south of St. Louis.
>
>__________________________________________________
>Do You Yahoo!?
>Get email at your own domain with Yahoo! Mail.
>http://personal.mail.yahoo.com/

messages.subject: Missouri, new to group
messages.msgSnippet: Hi my name is Kim and I am new to the group.  I just removed my boys, 4th and 5th grade from public school in January.  I had intended on Homeschooling, but
messages.messageBody:
Hi my name is Kim and I am new to the group. I just
removed my boys, 4th and 5th grade from public school
in January. I had intended on Homeschooling, but
quickly learned that my children and I are really
unschooling. Things seem to be going pretty good. It
takes some getting used to, a de-programming period,
if you will! However, all in all we are doing pretty
well, and learning together as we go. Our most
difficult task is keeping the 20 month old boy
satisfied.

Also, Julie, what type of material do you have? I am
in Missouri too. Where are you located? I am about
35- 40 miles south of St. Louis.

__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Get email at your own domain with Yahoo! Mail.
http://personal.mail.yahoo.com/
